sentences.en: Always stretch before exercising.
sentences.cn: 锻炼之前都要做伸展运动。

sentences.en: Ann stretched across the couch and grabbed the phone.
sentences.cn: 安向长沙发那头探过身，抓起电话。

sentences.en: Arms bend. Arms upward. Wait for it. Stretch.
sentences.cn: 手臂弯曲。手臂上举。保持一下。伸展。

sentences.en: by no stretch of the imagination could Carl ever be called good-looking.
sentences.cn: 卡尔无论如何也称不上好看。

sentences.en: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.
sentences.cn: 卡尔从床上坐起来，打了个呵欠，伸了伸懒 腰。

sentences.en: Everyone would be working at full stretch.
sentences.cn: 每个人都将全力以赴。

sentences.en: He offered his lighter at full stretch.
sentences.cn: 他伸长胳膊把打火机递了过去。

sentences.en: He was about to stretch out his hand to grab me.
sentences.cn: 他正要伸手抓我。

sentences.en: Her husband was not a womaniser by any stretch of the imagination.
sentences.cn: 她老公绝对不是个拈花惹草的人。

sentences.en: I often had to work for over twenty hours at a stretch.
sentences.cn: 我经常不得不连续工作20小时以上。

sentences.en: I'm trying to move on and stretch myself with something different.
sentences.cn: 我正想换工作，想尝试点不一样的事情来挑战一下自己。

sentences.en: it is aimed at one age group, adults, or, at a stretch, business studies students.
sentences.cn: 它的目标是一个年龄组的人，即成年人，或者勉强扩大到包括商科学生。

sentences.en: It is better to stretch the tight muscles first.
sentences.cn: 最好先伸展一下僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.en: It's a dangerous stretch of road.
sentences.cn: 那段路很不安全。

sentences.en: It's a very dangerous stretch of road.
sentences.cn: 这是一段非常危险的路。

sentences.en: Muscles stretch, slacken and relax during child-birth.
sentences.cn: 生孩子的时候，肌肉会拉抻、放松，然后松弛下来。

sentences.en: Nearby there is a stretch of white sand beach perfect for sunbathing.
sentences.cn: 附近有一片白色沙滩，是沐日光浴的绝佳场所。

sentences.en: since your daughter is one of my regular patients, I'm stretching a point.
sentences.cn: 既然你的女儿常来我这里看病，我就破一次例。

sentences.en: since your daughter is one of my regular patients, I'm stretching a point.
sentences.cn: 既然你的女儿常来我这里看病，我就破一次例。

sentences.en: Stand straight and stretch the left hand to the right foot.
sentences.cn: 站直身体,伸左手够右脚.

sentences.en: The jacuzzi was too small to stretch out in.
sentences.cn: 这个“极可意”浴缸太小了，躺不下。

sentences.en: The procession stretched for several miles.
sentences.cn: 游行队伍延伸了数英里。

sentences.en: The ski instructor showed us some special stretches.
sentences.cn: 滑雪教练给我们示范了几个特别的伸展动作。

sentences.en: Their films are exciting and really stretch the imagination.
sentences.cn: 他们的电影非常精彩且发人深省。

sentences.en: This stretch of Lost River was broader and deeper.
sentences.cn: 洛斯特里弗的这片水域又宽又深。

phrases.phrase: by no (或 not by any) stretch of the imagination
phrases.tran_cn: 任凭如何异想天开也不是，怎么想象也不是
冲刺阶段；（跑道的）终点直道（等于home straight）
散步：散步，尤指在长坐一段时间后
拉弯，拉伸弯曲；伸张弯曲
伸懒腰；伸展身体；尽最大的努力

trans.tran_cn: 一片，一段时间，舒展，弹性，直道
trans.tran_en: the action of stretching a part of your body out to its full length, or a particular way of doing this

trans.tran_cn: 伸展，拉紧，绵延，延续，足够买/支付，消耗，使极尽所能
trans.tran_en: to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to straighten your arms, legs, or body to full length
to reach a long way for something
to reach a long way for something
